attributes.action: Change the Logo for the 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Was this graffiti job worth £400,000 ? What does this tell us about the great city of London ? I call upon the Prime Minister to liase with the Culture, Media and Sport secretary to get this changed. 

We need the Olympic colours, the Olympic rings and an iconic symbol of London or the UK. Not this.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
